sprint_goal: Establish the core solution architecture and implement the secure, encrypted database persistence layer.
Implement the complete user login and role-based access control (RBAC) systems.
Implement critical security features: session inactivity lock/unlock and the complete audit trail system.
Deliver the core DICOM ingestion pipeline, enabling the system to function as a C-STORE SCP and reliably store incoming studies.
Deliver the high-performance DICOM viewer with core image manipulation tools (WW/WL, Zoom, Pan).
Complete the user management lifecycle features, including creating, editing, deleting, and resetting user passwords with a forced change workflow.
